remarks: Transfer a distributive law to the function operation.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Jul-2014.)
statement:
caofdi.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
caofdi.2 $e |- ( ph -> F : A --> K ) $.
caofdi.3 $e |- ( ph -> G : A --> S ) $.
caofdi.4 $e |- ( ph -> H : A --> S ) $.
caofdi.5 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. K /\ y e. S /\ z e. S ) ) -> ( x T ( y R z ) ) = ( ( x T y ) O ( x T z ) ) ) $.
caofdi $p |- ( ph -> ( F oF T ( G oF R H ) ) = ( ( F oF T G ) oF O ( F oF T H ) ) ) $.
$d A x y z $.
$d F x y z $.
$d G x y z $.
$d H x y z $.
$d K x y z $.
$d O x y z $.
$d R x y z $.
$d S x y z $.
$d T x y z $.
$d ph x y z $.
